name: Fafnir
text:
Break: Target resonator gains [-200/-200] until end of turn.
Flying
Continuous: Whenever this card is dealt battle damage, this card deals damage to target resonator equal to that damage.
Continuous: Whenever this card is dealt damage by a spell, this card deals an equal amount of damage to the player who played that spell.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
